basisSet.dc:title: Binning/Curtiss VTZP
basisSet.dc:description:
Binning/Curtiss Valence Double Zeta ------------------------------------ Elements Reference Ga - Kr: (14s,11p,6d,1f) -> [6s,4p,2d,1f] R. C. Binning, Jr. and L.A. Curtiss, J. Comp. Chem. 11, 1206 (1990). Primitive Exponents: T. H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 66, 1382 (1977)
These are groundstate, RHF energy-optimized basis sets.
